title: Android 10 Ambient Display Customization (repost)
content:
See the below post

https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/16045533?hl=en

I don't know why this post got locked without my agreement, unless Google thinks I'm annoying for asking.

There has been no update regarding this. It's still an embarrassingly issue that is embarrassingly easy to fix. Rather than shutting down your customer for giving feedback, why not address this once and for all?
